plot outline: Naan Sivanagiren is a 2011 Indian Tamil film, directed by Gnanasekar. The film stars Udhaykarthik, Varsha, Aditya, Premkumar, Sugumar in lead roles. The film had musical score by KS. Manoj. Watch the full movie, Naan Sivanagiren online, only on Eros Now.
